rukus.text: 74|32|Ore, savgand ʙa moh [ki hargiz cunin nest, ki onon tasavvur mekunand]
74|33|Va [savgand ʙa] saʙ hangome ki pust kunad
74|34|Va ʙa suʙh hangome ki ravsan savad
74|35|Ki on [otasi duzax] jake az [azoʙhoi] ʙuzurg [va havlnok] ast
74|36|Baroi inson ʙimdihanda ast
74|37|Baroi kase az sumo, ki ʙixohad [ʙo korhoi naku] pes aftad, jo [ʙo gunoh kardan] aqiʙ ʙimonad
74|38|Har kas dar garavi a'moli xes ast
74|39|Magar ashoʙi jamin [mu'minon]
74|40|Ki dar ʙoƣho [-i ʙihist] hastand va mepursand
74|41|az gunahgoron
74|42|«Ci ciz sumoro ʙa duzax darovard
74|43|[Duzaxijon] Megujand: «Mo az namozguzoron naʙudem
74|44|Va ʙenavo[-jon]-ro it'om namekardem
74|45|Va pajvasta hamrohi jovagujon [va ahli ʙotil] hamsado mesudem
74|46|Va hamvora ruzi cazoro takziʙ mekardem
74|47|To zamone, ki marg ʙa suroƣamon omad
74|48|Pas, safoati safoatkunandagon ʙa onho sude nameʙaxsad
74|49|Pas, onhoro ci sudaast, ki az pand [-u tazakkur] ruj gardondaand
74|50|Gui, ki gurxarone ramidaand
74|51|Ki az [muqoʙili] ser gurextaand
74|52|Balki har kadom az onho [tavaqqu' dorad va] mexohad, ki [ʙa u] nomae kusoda [va cudogona az suji Alloh taolo] doda savad
74|53|Hargiz, cunin nest [ki onon mepindorand]! Balki onho az [azoʙi] oxirat nametarsand
74|54|Na, cunin nest, ki onho megujand, on [Qur'on] jak tazakkur va jodovari ast
74|55|Pas, har kase, ki ʙixohad az on pand girad
74|56|Va jod namekunand [va pand namegirand], magar in ki Alloh taolo ʙixohad. Ust, ki sazovori parvo kardan va omurzidan ast
